pages.text: $(li)When a tamed Cat, Horse, Wolf or Foxhound dies, you will a time to save it.$(br)$(li)Just right click your diying pet while you are holding the Pet Bandage on your hand to revive it with half of one heart of life.
$(li)This item can be crafted placing Wool and Paper in a Crafting Table.$(br2)Insert a picture of a Flute
